data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Motamedinia, Behnam, Kehlmaier, Christian, Mokhtari, Azizollah, Rakhshani, Ehsan, Gilasian, Ebrahim (2017): Discovery of the genus Claraeola Aczél in Iran with the description of two new species (Diptera: Pipunculidae). Zootaxa 4227 (4): 563-572, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4227.4.6|7 occurrences
